## Critical Architecture Decision

## Key Messages Enforced

### 1. Data Flow Architecture
- âœ… DefinitionGeneratorContext is THE single source of truth
- âœ… All context MUST flow through this component
- âœ… No alternative paths or shortcuts allowed

### 2. UI/Data Separation
- âœ… UI preview strings are PRESENTATION only
- âœ… Structured lists are DATA sources
- âœ… Never parse UI strings for data extraction
- âœ… Custom "Anders..." entries work within structured lists

### 3. Compliance Approach
- âœ… ASTRA validation as warnings, never blocking
- âœ… Justice sector alignment maintained
- âœ… Flexibility for custom entries preserved
